details.description:
This small hamlet, located in the lap of nature and nurtured by the Tirthan river, one of the tributaries of the Beas river, is one of the most popular relaxing destinations for tourists in the area. Its location, surrounded by lush vegetation and mountains, makes this destination a very special place.

This destination's sightseeing is the perfect way to experience the marvels of nature all at once. The second level of glamour is added to this destination by the traditional style cottage houses made of wood and stone.

While travelling to this destination, the most popular attractions are the Raghupur fort, Jibhi waterfall, Chehni Kothi, Jalori Pass, Seruvalsar and Manimahesh Lake, Chhoie Waterfall, Syringa rishi temple, Balo temple, and others.

This destination is particularly popular with young people due to its trekking, river rafting, and camping opportunities.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO JIBHI
brief: We depart from Delhi around 6 PM in an AC Vehicle. (Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it.)

itinerary.title: LOCAL SIGHTSEEING
brief: Arrive at the Homestay/Campsite in the morning & Have Breakfast. Check-in and freshen up.
Some time is offered for relaxing and acclimatization.
Thereafter, you go to the Jibhi Waterfall.
Later, come back to the Homestay/Campsite. dinner and night dinner is offered at the Homestay/Campsite.

itinerary.title: JALORI PASS& SEROLSAR LAKE
brief: After a delicious breakfast in the Homestay/Campsite.
You will be taken for a drive to the Jalori Pass. Here you can enjoy the stunning 3600 views of the Great Himalayas and the Kullu Valley.
You can also opt for a trek to Serolsar Lake -in case you don't want to explore 3600 views.
Later come back to Homestay/Campsite and enjoy bonfires with relieving music. dinner and overnight stay.

itinerary.title: TIME TO GET BACK
brief: Wake up, and feel the breathtaking view of morning.
Have breakfast and check out Homestay/Campsite.
Later we will head towards Kullu for the enthralling river rafting.
Later departure for Delhi by 5 pm with lots of marvellous views and everlasting remembrances of Tirthan Valley.

inclusion: Accommodation for 2 nights in a Homestay/Campsite
A total of 5 meals-2 meals on Day 1 + 2 meals on Day 2 + 1 meal on Day 3
Local Sightseeing. D Guide while Trekking.
exclusion: Adventure activities anything not mentioned in the itinerary
Any Meals / Drinks other than Inclusion

itinerary.title: MANALI EXPLORATION

details.description:
Rishikesh YOGA capital of the world is a well-known destination for spiritual practice and nature lovers. The Place is famous among youth mostly for river rafting, trekking and Summer camps. Rishikesh is also called the Devbhoomi ( land of god) for various religious places associated with Hinduism. Rishikesh has the most ancient and famous temples in India, like Neelkhanth Mahadev, Bhootnath Temple, Raghunath Temple, Trayambakeshwar temple, Lakshman temple And many more temples.

The foothill of the Himalayas provides it with a very attractive geographical location, along with the Ganga river, Ram jhula, Laxman jhula, Neer Garh waterfall, all these things made this place a perfect holiday destination for visitors with family and friends.

Along with various adventure and sports activities bungee jumping, river rafting, Trekking, and Camping along with Ganga aarti enhances the beauty of this place and is perfect to make the trip memorable. People from all over the world come to this place to practice yoga and meditation. Handicrafts and local traditional crafts, dresses and folk music and dance of local gharwali culture make it a perfect destination.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO DEVBHOOMI (RISHIKESH)
brief: Depart for Rishikesh in an AC vehicle, by 11 pm from Delhi.
For the biggest and grandest event of them all, Rishikesh Holi is going to be like a storm that hits you least expect it.

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL AT DESTINATION
brief: Arrival at Rishikesh by early morning, check-in your camps
As you will step out of the campsite, the color of Holi will enrich your heart and mind with more and more joy
The smell of color floating in the air will definitely please your soul
Then head out to celebrate the festival of colors, Holi
Enjoy the whole day grooving on the musical vibes.
Rest for a while in the evening
Have fun around music and a bonfire
Dinner and overnight stay at the campsite

itinerary.title: ADVENTURE AND JOY
brief: Wake up and have Breakfast in the Camps
Get yourself refreshed and afterward be ready for one of the most adventurous and joyful activities
River Rafting, of 14 km in holy Ganga.
In the evening explore Ram jhula and Laxman jhula
Later depart back to Delhi by evening

itinerary.title: BACK TO HOME
brief: Reach Delhi in the morning

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Kashmir has picturesque valleys, high-altitude lakes, boathouses, apple orchards, snow-capped peaks and orchards lush with apples attracting tourists from all over the world. It is the ideal holiday destination for a couple, a family, or even for a solo traveller.

To the northeast is the Karakoram, and to the northwest is the Hindu Kush mountain range. There are high mountain ranges up to 28000 feet in elevation, making this a more pleasant place for explorers. Siachen and Biafo glacier is India's longest glacier.

K2 and Nanga Parbat highest peaks of Himalaya, Gulmarg Valley, Poonch Valley, Betab valley, Grassland, National parks, a forest of deodar, Chinar trees and field of saffron and a garden of colourful flowers make it a heaven on earth.

Vaishno Devi temple, Amarnath Yatra, Shankaracharya temple, and many Buddhist monasteries demonstrate their cultural significance to Hindus and Buddhists.

Some festivals display the culture of Kashmir such as the Tulip festival, Shikara Boat race, Sindhu Darshan festival, and represent native Kashmiris' daily lives. Native delicious foods, unique handicrafts and famous Pashmina, Amlikar, and Dorukha shawls are examples of the rich handicraft skills of the locals.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Kashmir
brief: Start your journey to Kashmir.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar– Local sightseeing 50 Kms(Mughal Gardens)
brief: On arrival at Srinagar Airport, you will be met by our representative/driver at the airport and transferred to the Hotel. Half-day tour of world famous Mughal Gardens i.e. Nishat Garden, Shalimar Garden and Cheshma Shahi. In the late Evening Shikara Ride on dal lake for Up to 1 Hour

Nishat Garden:- Located on the bank of the Dal Lake, with the Zabarwan Mountains as its backdrop, Nishat Bagh is a garden of bliss that commands a magnificent view of the lake beneath the snow-capped Pir Panjal mountain range that stands far away from the west of the valley. The Bagh was designed and built-in 1633 by Asif Khan, elder brother of Nur Jehan.

Shalimar Garden:- The Shalimar Bagh is the celebrated royal garden of Kashmir. Emperor Jahangir was so fascinated with the garden that he called it one of the sights of Kashmir. Shalimar Bagh is located on the northeast side of Lake Dal, approximately fifteen kilometres away from the centre of Srinagar. It was laid out by Jahangir as Farah Baksh (the delightful) in 1619, while he was founding the city of Srinagar.

Cheshma Shahi:- Cheshma Shahi ( the royal spring), also called Cheshma Shahi, is one of the Mughal gardens built around a spring by Ali Mardan, a governor of Mughal emperor Shah Jahan, in 1632. The garden is located in the Zabarwan Range, near Rajbhawan (Governor‘s house) overlooking Dal Lake in Srinagar, Kashmir.

itinerary.title: Srinagar – Gulmarg – Srinagar 108 Kms.
brief: Gulmarg (2730 Meters Above sea Level) (Meadow of Flowers ) is a town, a hill station, and a popular skiing destination during winters. Gulmarg is famous because of its Gulmarg Gondola , one of the highest cable cars in the world (Direct Payment Basis).
In the evening return back to Srinagar. Overnight at the Hotel.

itinerary.title: Srinagar – Sonmarg – Srinagar 168 Km Delhi
brief: Sonmarg (2800 Meters above sea level), which means ' meadow of gold ' has, as its backdrop, snowy mountains against a cerulean sky.
The Sindh meanders along here and abounds with trout and mahseer, snow trout can be caught in the main river. The visitors can have access to snow which is furnished all over like a white carpet.
Ponies can be hired for the trip up to Thajiwas glacier, a major attraction during the summer months. In the evening return back to Srinagar. Overnight at the Hotel.

itinerary.title: Srinagar – Pahalgam - Srinagar 186 Km
brief: Pahalgam 2440 Meters above sea level (Valley of Shepherds) on the way to visit Saffron fields. Pahalgam is the most famous place in the Indian Film Industry. Enjoy the natural charm of the valley.

One can visit Betaab Valley, Chandanwari and Aru Valley in Pahalgam (Direct payment basis). Betaab Valley:- Betaab Valley is a very famous tourist spot situated at a distance of 15 kilometres from Pahalgam. The valley got its name from the Sunny Deol-Amrita Singh hit debut film Betaab.

The Valley is northeast of Pahalgam and falls between Pahalgam and Chandanwari and is a route to Amarnath Temple Yatra. The valley is surrounded by lush green meadows, snow-clad mountains and covered with dense vegetation.

Aru Valley:- Aru has located around 12km from Pahalgam, 11 km upstream from the Lidder River. Noted for its scenic meadows, lakes and mountains, it is a base camp for trekking to the Kolahoi Glacier and Tarsar Lake.
The village lies on the left bank of the Aru River, which is a tributary of the Lidder River.

Chandanwari:- Chandanwari is situated 16-km from Pahalgam; Chandanwari is the starting point of the Amarnath Yatra, which takes place every year in the month of Sawan (Rain). It is famous for snow sledging on a snow bridge.

itinerary.title: Srinagar Airport Drop
brief: Transfering time to the airport to connect onward destination flights with a lot of memories.

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Kedarnath, the place of Lord Shiva. In India, Kedarnath is one of the most prominent pilgrimage sites since ancient times. It is one of the 12 jyotirlingas of lord shiva, this destination attracts a lot of people every year due to its spiritual importance as well as its attractive establishment in the lap of Nature, surrounded by the snow-covered Himalayas attracting thousands of travellers to this site.

This place is approx. 220 km away from Rishikesh, At an elevation of 11000 feet near the source of the Mandakini river, surrounded by Kedarnath mountain. The lush green vegetation and 22000 feet high Kedarnath peak make it more attractive for trekking and camping.

The most popular Kedarnath temple of lord shiva is one of the Char Dham temple, Shri Bhairanath Temple, Adi Shankaracharya Samadhi (a popular saint of the 7th century), Chorabari Tal, Chorabari Glacier, Vasuki Tal,Rudra Meditation cave, Sona paryag, Guptkashi, Gauri Kund, Chandrshila peak for trekking.

One can do trekking and rock climbing as adventure activities, and can also buy Saligrams, Herbsas medicine, Shilajit, natural vitalizes, precious stones and beads of tulsi in the local market for himself and his family.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO KEDARNATH
brief: Depart for Destiantion
An overnight Journey

itinerary.title: DELHI - HARIDWAR - THE GATEWAY OF GOD'S LAND
brief: In Haridwar a small halt, before heading toward Guptkashi
Halt for a biometric test at Rishikesh for around 4 to 5  hours
One can also observe the beauty of the yoga capital of the world, While waiting for a biometrics test
The route will also cover the Byasi, Devprayag, Srinagar, Rudraprayag, and Agastmuni hill stations on the way

itinerary.title: Srinagar – Gulmarg – Srinagar 108 Kms.
brief: Gulmarg (2730 Meters Above sea Level) (Meadow of Flowers ) is a town, a hill station, and a popular skiing destination during winters. Gulmarg is famous because of its Gulmarg Gondola , one of the highest cable cars in the world (Direct Payment Basis).
In the evening return back to Srinagar. Overnight at the Hotel.
Have a delicious lunch during the journey
Reach the destination by evening. Check-in at the hotel and have some recreation in the evening
Night stay at Guptkashi/Rudraprayag/Phata relying on the availability

itinerary.title: DARSHAN OF KEDARNATH - HIKE TOWARD THE SACRED KEDARNATH TEMPLE
brief: Day will start at 4:00 AM as we will do trekking to sacred Kedarnath, Same day returning to Guptkashi
Have a tasty breakfast and get prepared for the journey from Guptkashi to Sonprayag
Reach Sonprayag, Have a wonderful walking walk to Gaurikund (Walk around 1 Km, no private vehicles allowed to Gaurikund)
After Reaching Gaurikund, Being the trekking to the Kedarnath
You can hire ponies or palanquins for further journeys (Own Expense)
Trekking via the beautiful valleys and river streams
A small halt for lunch afterward continues the journey
It’s time to enter Kedarnath Temple
In the afternoon head back to Guptkashi
Have a joyful dinner and Night stay at Guptkashi

itinerary.title: GUPTKASHI-RISHIKESH - EVENING AARTI AT TRIVENI GHAT
brief: Awaken with the fascinating view of mountains all around Guptkashi
Have a healthful breakfast
Start traveling back to Rishikesh
Arrival at Rishikesh, Check-in into hotels, get yourself refreshed, it’s time to explore Devbhoomi (Rishikesh)
If time allows, One can explore colorful local markets, Ram Jhula & Laxman jhula.
Have a mouthwatering dinner at Rishikesh, and some recreational activities
Overnight Stay at Rishikesh.

brief: Get up at sunrise & Be ready to undergo the thrill of rafting in the chilly waters of holy Ganga
Time to back to home destination with lots of unforgettable memory

In a lifetime, we all want to have been a Manali once either with friends or with family. Manali is the most liked honeymoon and holiday destination for couples and solo trips. At the end of Kullu valley, near the Beas river, this beautiful city is located.

It is also a pass to Leh-Ladakh through various mountain passes at a height of 13000 feet making it a natural way to Ladakh, these passes include Rohtang La pass, Baralacha La pass, and Nakee La pass.

Lakes, grassland, a forest of deodar, a waterfall, a garden and other picturesque sites make this destination more attractive to visitors.

Adventure and sports like Paragliding, Rafting, Zorbing, Trekking, and Skiing are the prominent activities of this place.

Hadimba temple, Manikarn Gurudwara, Gompa Buddhist temple, and many others are the Religious and spiritual sights at this destination, which makes it more divine for visitors of different religions.

Kasol

Valley is popularly known for sports, activities, and its handicrafts products including Tibetan handicraft dresses, Prayer wheels, Thangkas, stories and many more things.
Gurudwara Manikaran Sahib, Naina Bhagwati mandir, Manikaran hot water spring, Parvati river and many waterfalls make it a perfect destination.

Solang Valley

Solang valley is mainly popular for sports and adventure activities along with rural life. It offers many places for the nature lover who wants to break from busy city life.

Later come back to the hotel and enjoy dinner with a bonfire and music

details.description:
In a lifetime, we all want to have been a Manali once either with friends or with family. Manali is the most liked honeymoon and holiday destination for couples and solo trips. At the end of Kullu valley, near the Beas river, this beautiful city is located.

It is also a pass to Leh-Ladakh through various mountain passes at a height of 13000 feet making it a natural way to Ladakh, these passes include Rohtang La pass, Baralacha La pass, and Nakee La pass.

Lakes, grassland, a forest of deodar, a waterfall, a garden and other picturesque sites make this destination more attractive to visitors.

Adventure and sports like Paragliding, Rafting, Zorbing, Trekking, and Skiing are the prominent activities of this place.

Hadimba temple, Manikarn Gurudwara, Gompa Buddhist temple, and many others are the Religious and spiritual sights at this destination, which makes it more divine for visitors of different religions.

Kasol

Valley is popularly known for sports, activities, and its handicrafts products including Tibetan handicraft dresses, Prayer wheels, Thangkas, stories and many more things.
Gurudwara Manikaran Sahib, Naina Bhagwati mandir, Manikaran hot water spring, Parvati river and many waterfalls make it a perfect destination.

Solang Valley

Solang valley is mainly popular for sports and adventure activities along with rural life. It offers many places for the nature lover who wants to break from busy city life.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO MANALI
brief: We depart from Delhi around 6 PM in an AC Vehicle.

itinerary.title: MANALI EXPLORATION
brief: Reach Manali by morning. Check in to the hotel, freshen up & have breakfast.
After relaxing, opt for local sightseeing.
In the Evening, Drive towards the magical street of Old Manali for Cafe Hopping.
Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.title: SLONG VALLEY EXCURSION
brief: Wake up with the beautiful site in front of your eyes
Have a delicious breakfast at the hotel
Then drive toward Solang valley to experience snow activities like skiing, Zorbing, ATV rides, etc.
Later come back to the hotel and enjoy dinner with a bonfire and music
Overnight stay in Manali

itinerary.title: MANALI- KASOL- MANIKARAN- DELHI
brief: Enjoy your time near the river bed, have breakfast by 11 am
Head towards Kasol and Manikaran
After that head back to Delhi with never-ending memories

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Kashmir has picturesque valleys, high-altitude lakes, boathouses, apple orchards, snow-capped peaks and orchards lush with apples attracting tourists from all over the world. It is the ideal holiday destination for a couple, a family, or even for a solo traveller.

To the northeast is the Karakoram, and to the northwest is the Hindu Kush mountain range. There are high mountain ranges up to 28000 feet in elevation, making this a more pleasant place for explorers. Siachen and Biafo glacier is India's longest glacier.

K2 and Nanga Parbat highest peaks of Himalaya, Gulmarg Valley, Poonch Valley, Betab valley, Grassland, National parks, a forest of deodar, Chinar trees and field of saffron and a garden of colourful flowers make it a heaven on earth.

Vaishno Devi temple, Amarnath Yatra, Shankaracharya temple, and many Buddhist monasteries demonstrate their cultural significance to Hindus and Buddhists.

Some festivals display the culture of Kashmir such as the Tulip festival, Shikara Boat race, Sindhu Darshan festival, and represent native Kashmiris' daily lives. Native delicious foods, unique handicrafts and famous Pashmina, Amlikar, and Dorukha shawls are examples of the rich handicraft skills of the locals.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Kashmir
brief: Start your journey to Kashmir.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Srinagar– Local sightseeing 50 Kms(Mughal Gardens)
brief: On arrival at Srinagar Airport, you will be met by our representative/driver at the airport and transferred to the Hotel. Half-day tour of world famous Mughal Gardens i.e. Nishat Garden, Shalimar Garden and Cheshma Shahi. In the late Evening Shikara Ride on dal lake for Up to 1 Hour

Nishat Garden:- Located on the bank of the Dal Lake, with the Zabarwan Mountains as its backdrop, Nishat Bagh is a garden of bliss that commands a magnificent view of the lake beneath the snow-capped Pir Panjal mountain range that stands far away from the west of the valley. The Bagh was designed and built-in 1633 by Asif Khan, elder brother of Nur Jehan.

Shalimar Garden:- The Shalimar Bagh is the celebrated royal garden of Kashmir. Emperor Jahangir was so fascinated with the garden that he called it one of the sights of Kashmir. Shalimar Bagh is located on the northeast side of Lake Dal, approximately fifteen kilometres away from the centre of Srinagar. It was laid out by Jahangir as Farah Baksh (the delightful) in 1619, while he was founding the city of Srinagar.

Cheshma Shahi:- Cheshma Shahi ( the royal spring), also called Cheshma Shahi, is one of the Mughal gardens built around a spring by Ali Mardan, a governor of Mughal emperor Shah Jahan, in 1632. The garden is located in the Zabarwan Range, near Rajbhawan (Governor‘s house) overlooking Dal Lake in Srinagar, Kashmir.

itinerary.title: Srinagar – Gulmarg – Srinagar 108 Kms.
brief: Gulmarg (2730 Meters Above sea Level) (Meadow of Flowers ) is a town, a hill station, and a popular skiing destination during winters. Gulmarg is famous because of its Gulmarg Gondola , one of the highest cable cars in the world (Direct Payment Basis).
In the evening return back to Srinagar. Overnight at the Hotel.

itinerary.title: Srinagar – Sonmarg – Srinagar 168 Km Delhi
brief: Sonmarg (2800 Meters above sea level), which means ' meadow of gold ' has, as its backdrop, snowy mountains against a cerulean sky.
The Sindh meanders along here and abounds with trout and mahseer, snow trout can be caught in the main river. The visitors can have access to snow which is furnished all over like a white carpet.
Ponies can be hired for the trip up to Thajiwas glacier, a major attraction during the summer months. In the evening return back to Srinagar. Overnight at the Hotel.

itinerary.title: Srinagar – Pahalgam - Srinagar 186 Km
brief: Pahalgam 2440 Meters above sea level (Valley of Shepherds) on the way to visit Saffron fields. Pahalgam is the most famous place in the Indian Film Industry. Enjoy the natural charm of the valley.

One can visit Betaab Valley, Chandanwari and Aru Valley in Pahalgam (Direct payment basis). Betaab Valley:- Betaab Valley is a very famous tourist spot situated at a distance of 15 kilometres from Pahalgam. The valley got its name from the Sunny Deol-Amrita Singh hit debut film Betaab.

The Valley is northeast of Pahalgam and falls between Pahalgam and Chandanwari and is a route to Amarnath Temple Yatra. The valley is surrounded by lush green meadows, snow-clad mountains and covered with dense vegetation.

Aru Valley:- Aru has located around 12km from Pahalgam, 11 km upstream from the Lidder River. Noted for its scenic meadows, lakes and mountains, it is a base camp for trekking to the Kolahoi Glacier and Tarsar Lake.
The village lies on the left bank of the Aru River, which is a tributary of the Lidder River.

Chandanwari:- Chandanwari is situated 16-km from Pahalgam; Chandanwari is the starting point of the Amarnath Yatra, which takes place every year in the month of Sawan (Rain). It is famous for snow sledging on a snow bridge.

itinerary.title: Srinagar Airport Drop
brief: Transfering time to the airport to connect onward destination flights with a lot of memories.

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Whether you're traveling alone or with your peers. Ladakh gives you a full package of nature and adventure together.

Ladakh means the Land of passes which is known as the highest plateau in India with a height of 10000 feet, and its natural boundaries Karakoram Mountain range in the north and the Zaskar with Ladakh range in the east make it a perfect holiday destination for nature lovers, various Mountain passes make it more stunning for bikers.

Pangong Tso lake is known for its color changing ability at an elevation of 4500 feet and 134 km long, with wonderful experiences, the famous Nubra Valley, Hemis Monastery, Drogas, Archery Competition in Ladakh tradition dresses, and a lot more.

Ladakh is known for its rivers, valleys, mountain ranges, lakes, waterfalls, and spiritual practices. Ladakh is widely known for riding up the highest motorable roads.

Ladakh's culture is very glamorous for visitors, offering a variety of experiences. There are many historical and cultural sites, as well as monasteries. This place is incredible due to its cuisine, chorus and dance, conventional handwork, recreations, and carnivals.

itinerary.title: Delhi To Ladakh
brief: Depart for Ladakh in Night, An overnight journey to destination

itinerary.title: Arrival at destination
brief: After you will reach Leh, our tour guide will welcome you and take you for accommodation
A traditional welcome on arrival, Get Refresh yourself  be prepared for the weather of Ladakh
You can visit Shanti Stupa most  popular sunset hangout site and well-known for its stunning views of Leh
One can also explore the Leh Palace.
If time allows in the evening, explore the local market of the city for high altitude equipment.
Have dinner and a night's stay in the hotel.

itinerary.title: Magnetic Hill - Confluence of Indus - Zanskar River
brief: Have a flavorful breakfast
Let's begin with the glorious view of The Sangam or Confluence of the two most prominent streams of this destination, the rivers Zanskar and Indus.
This place is also a confluence of different complexions.
Can also visit the notable Gurudwara, Gurudwara Pathar Sahib.
Later on aim to the Magnetic Hill to witness a miracle, your car will go upward even in neutral gear.
Have a delicious dinner and a Night's stay at a hotel in Leh.

itinerary.title: Leh to Nubra Valley over Khardung La
brief: Have a delicious breakfast, Afterwards drive to the gorgeous Nubra Valley.
Drive through the world's highest motorable pass, Khardung La.
Enjoy the white dunes of Hundar, where you can take pleasure in a double-humped camel ride
Check-in at the hotel/camp in Nubra Valley
If time allows, visit the beautiful Diskit Gompa a Monastery
Have a delicious dinner and a Night's stay in Nubra Valley

itinerary.title: Nubra – Pangong Lake
brief: Have breakfast, Now it's time to drive to Pangong Tso Lake on the Indo-China border.
The journey takes the traveler to the picturesque villages of Shey and Thiksey and shifts from the Indus valley to the side of Chemrey and Shakti.
Pass over the Ladakh ranges through The Chang-la (at an elevation of 17,586 feet) with ease  despite its great height
Have a delightful Dinner and Night's stay

itinerary.title: Back to Leh from Pangong Tso Lake
brief: Get up in the daylight to the scenery of the elegant Pangong Tso Lake and Have a luscious breakfast glimpsing at the lake
Drive back to Leh through Chang La Pass
Tour of thiksey Gompa a Tibetan Buddhism Monastery
Also, visit Shey Gompa a monastery and Palace
Reach Leh by noon.
Night stay in Leh

itinerary.title: Time to Depart to Home
brief: Have breakfast, Afterwards, you will be switched to the Airport for your journey back home with recollections of this cold desert.

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Goa is located on the coast of the Arabian Sea of the Konkan region, Goa is the smallest yet most historical and popular state in western India. The location is one of the most outstanding honeymoons and family vacation spots in the summer.

Calangute and Baga Beach in North Goa, Arossim and Majorda Beach in South Goa are some of the best spots for entertainment. Among the many cultural sites are Fort Aguada, Chopra Fort, Reis Magos Fort, Museums and Beachside Restaurants, which all combine to make this place a great destination for travellers.

Many sports activities attract a lot of youth and sports lovers to this destination, such as Scuba Diving, Bungee Jumping, Paragliding, Hot air balloons flight and Exploring the Konkan with the yacht.

The Western Ghats add a majority of diversity to the culture and biodiversity within the state along with a huge number of Wildlife Sanctuary and Bird sanctuaries such as Mhadei Wildlife Sanctuary, and Netravali Wildlife Sanctuary, and Merces Bird Sanctuary, making it a favourite destination for photoshoots.

The best gift that one can bring for himself, family, and friends are handicraft products, shells galore for decorating the house, cashew nuts at very cheap prices, musical instruments for those who love music, and Fenni, the liquor made from dry fruits.

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL IN GOA
brief: Welcome to the party capital of India. Your 4-day Goa tour package starts now.
As you arrive at the Goa airport/railway station, an agent's representative will receive you and escort you to the hotel. Complete check-in formalities and relax for some time.
Spend the entire first day of your Goa trip leisurely. Explore the sun-kissed beaches of Goa or try some amazing Goan delicacies.
As you bid goodbye today to one of your Goa holidays, come back to the hotel and have a goodnight's sleep.

itinerary.title: NORTH GOA SIGHTSEEING TOUR
brief: The second day of your Goa holiday takes you to explore the gems of North Goa.
Have breakfast and get ready to embark on a full-day North Goa sightseeing tour.
The first attraction that you will visit on your North Goa tour is the ancient Fort Aguada. Later, explore Coco Beach, Calangute Annexe, Calangute Beach, Baga Beach, and Anjuna Beach.
As the second day of your Goa tour itinerary comes to an end, come back to the hotel and sleep off the night.

itinerary.title: SOUTH GOA SIGHTSEEING TOUR
brief: Today on your Goa vacation, explore the eye-catching attractions of South Goa
Relish a delicious breakfast and get ready to explore the tourist hotspots of South Goa on the third day of your Goa tour
Visit Shri Shantadurga Temple at Kavlem and Shri Manguesh Temple at Priol.
Next, take a trip to the churches of Old Goa like the Basilica of Bom Jesus and Se Cathedral. Post lunch, visit Dona Paula Bay and Miramar Beach
Later on, during your Goa holiday, indulge in street shopping at the Panjim Market Towards the end of the day, return to the hotel and sleep off the night

itinerary.title: DEPARTURE FROM GOA
brief: This is the last day of your 4-day Goa tour package. Bid goodbye to Goa with nostalgic memories
Post breakfast, check out from the hotel and you will be transferred to the airport/railway station to reach your home destination with never-ending memories.

details.description:
In India,Auli is also known as a ,skiing destination,. Visitors to this hill station enjoy the fantastic adventure sports opportunities such as skiing, trekking, ropeways, and camping,. Along with these things, this place also offers visitors a lot of,natural beauty and the,Himalayan culture,.

Visiting this place will provide you with an abundance of sightseeing opportunities. It has the ,Trishul peak, of Himalaya, the ,Auli artificial man-made lake, Chenab lake, Hanuman Ghat, Nanda Devi National Park,, and ,Garson Bugyal, a pastures land dotted with ,oak trees, Vasudhara Falls,, Kuari pass trek, etc.

Besides natural wonders, this place also offers a lot of sightseeing associated with religious importance, like,Joshimath Math, Rudrparyag, Narahinga Temple, Hemkund Sahib, an important gurudwara associated with,Guru Govind Singh,, and Gopeshwar,, a place with many ancient temples.

You can purchase a variety of goods from this place to give as,gifts, to your friends and family. You can get ,kumaoni, and ,garhwali style handicraft, items made out of ,bamboo for your kitchen utility, decorations, carpets, baskets, etc. You can also get handwoven jute carpets and bags, fresh jams and pickles made out of fresh fruits, local fruit wine,, honey, and,hand-knitted woolen clothes..

This destination is the complete package of enjoyment with Adventure, sports, photography, spirituality, and peace in the lap of nature.

itinerary.title: DELHI - JOSHIMATH/AULI
brief: Start your journey at 7 P.M by tempo traveler. Overnight journey to AULI

itinerary.title: JOSHIMATH/AULI-AULI SIGHTSEEING
brief: Upon arriving at the Auli point of Ropeway after breakfast, you can view skiers in Auli from the Ropeway
A short hike from Auli takes you to Gurson Bugyal, where you can see imposing mountains like Nanda Devi, Trishul, and Drona
Enjoying Joshimath/Auli museum, having dinner and staying in a hotel in Joshimath/Auli

itinerary.title: LOCAL SIGHT SEEN
brief: We will spend the entire day touring Auli's local sights after breakfast
After dinner, we went back to the hotel to enjoy an overnight stay in Joshimath/Auli

itinerary.title: JOSHIMATH/AULI DELHI
brief: Enjoy your time near the mountain bed
Have breakfast by 11 am
With never-ending memories, head back to Delhi

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Wayanad, which completely lies in the western ghat of India, has rich cultural and historical sites along with green lush vegetation waterfalls, rivers, lakes dams and a hill station with dense forest. All these things make this place a wonderful destination for nature lovers, solo as well as for couples.

This place offers a variety of sightseeing for visitors like Edakkal cave showing cave paintings of around 6000 Bc, Wayanad wildlife sanctuary having 4 major hills of western ghats and a variety of wildlife, Banasura Sagar Dam ( Asia's second-largest dam) and Pookode lake for boating, Karlad lake, Meenmutty Waterfall, Soochipara falls,Kanthanpara Waterfalls.

Apart from this, there is Kuruvadweep island and many religious places like Pallikkunnu Church, Thirunelli Temple, Pakshipathalam Bird Sanctuary, Jain Temple, and Chain Tree, Wayanad Heritage Museum, Varambetta Mosque etc.

In this destination, people enjoy western ghats Hiking, Wildlife Safari, Enjoying Hilltop views, River Birdwatching, Boating, Bamboo Rafting, Camping with friends, Zip-lining over hills, and Cycling in local Tree house experiences, visiting local plantation farms.

There are a variety of articles that you can buy for your loved ones like Tea, Honey, Native Crafts, Herbal Plant, Bamboo articles and other Hand made products.

itinerary.title: WAY FROM DELHI TO WAYANAD
brief: Overnight journey to the destination, the wonderful land of Kerala

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL AT DESTINATION AND JOURNEY BEGIN
brief: Check-in at the Hotel. Have breakfast, Time to Tour Pookode Lake and the spooky Chain tree
Feel the beauty of mountain ranges, lush green gardens, and valleys while driving
Back to the hotel in the evening. Time to get into the local market
Overnight stay in Wayanad

itinerary.title: CHEMBRA PEAK
brief: Have breakfast, Hiking toward Chembra peak at 6890 ft., have a wonderful view of valleys and lake
Full day exploration with hiking
Back to the hotel by evening
Night stay

Now it's Soochipara Waterfall and Edakkal Caves
By Evening out for Delhi

details.description:
Madikeri, a wonderful hill town of southern India, situated at an elevation of 3700 feet is also known as Raja's seat. This destination is famous for its large variety of flora and fauna and paddy fields.

This place is also very popular among the youth for its sports and adventurous activity. Top sightseeing at this destination is Raja's seat, which is a garden with artificial fountains, Abbey Falls, Iruppu Falls, Raja's Tomb, Madikeri Fort, Raja's Tomb, Coorg Adventure club, Tadiandamol Peak, Honnamana Kere lake largest lake in this city, Brahmgiri wildlife sanctuary, Nagarhole National Park, Bird watching, Virajpet Hill station and much more.

Apart from this, there are also some religious places enhancing the beauty of the city like Rameshwara Temple, Omkareshwar Temple, Sri Bhagandeshwara temple, Kukke Shree Subramanya temple and Golden Temple, a Buddhist monastery belonging to Tibetan Buddhism. All are adding beauty to the culture of the city.

Due to its extraordinary geographically advantage, This destination offers numerous adventurous sports activities to the visitors, like white water rafting, Mountain hiking, waterfall hike, Cycling in the hilly terrain, Zip lining, Local Ayurvedic Spa treatment, Rock climbing, Elephant camping etc. all these are bolstering the beauty of this destination.

You can also explore the local market to get Pure Honey, Spices, Dry fruits, Chocolate and orange, Tibetan handmade artefacts, Coorg wine made from fruits and much more.

brief: overnight night journey to the destination, the wonderful land of Madikeri

Visit to Sri Bhagamandala Temple
Enjoy the shopping in the local market
In the evening, Experience the wonderful sunset at Raja’s Seats
Back to the hotel in the evening
Overnight stay in Hotel

itinerary.title: CHEMBRA PEAK
brief: Have breakfast, Hiking toward Kotebetta peak at 5120 ft., have a wonderful view of valleys and lake
Full day exploration with hiking
Back to the hotel by evening
Night stay in Coorg

By Evening out for Delhi

details.description:
Chikmagalur or Chikmagaluru was also known as the “coffee land of India '' a hill station destination in southern India that completely lies in western ghats and is popularly known for its coffee plantation. This destination is visited by thousands of people as honeymoon and holiday destinations. As Karnataka is the largest producer of coffee in India, the hilly terrain full of coffee plantations is one of the key glamours for tourists.

Kudremukh National park, Bhadra wildlife sanctuary, Bhadra Dam, Mullayanagiri Peak, Hanumana Gundi Falls, Hebbe Falls, Kallathigiri Falls, Baba Budangiri (one of the most visited places in Baba Budan range), Coffee Museum, Z point ( one of the best place for trekking in Karnataka), Hirekolale lake, Ayyanakere Lake, Ballalarayana Durga fort, etc. this place offers a lot more which will make your trip unforgettable and Adventurous.

Apart from the wonder of nature this place also has many religious sites which enrich the cultural beauty of this place like Kodandarama Temple the temple that depicts Sri Ram and Lakshmana holding an arrow, Sringeri Sharada Peetham is the first-ever Peeth established by Adi Shankaracharya, Shri Veenanarayan temple, the shrine is dedicated to Lord Vishnu and showing their different incarnations and many more things to stimulate your spirituality.

Camping, Mountain hikes, pilgrimage town visits, coffee plantation tours, boat riding road, motorbiking reservoir, jet-skiing, and natural spa treatment are the sports activities that one can enjoy at this destination.

itinerary.title: DESTINATION  ARRIVAL - KEMMANAGUNDI EXPLORATION
brief: Early morning reaches Chikmagalur, the ,"coffee land of Karnataka"
Check-in at the Hotel. Have breakfast, Out for Kemmanagundi to explore the hill stations.
Explore the mountain range, lush green gardens and valleys
Back to the hotel in the evening.

itinerary.title: EXPLORATION
brief: Have breakfast, and trek to Mullayanagiri peak at an elevation of 6,315 ft, to experience the beauty of nature
Now time to, visit Baba Budangiri, Jhari waterfall, Kavikal Gandhi
Back to the hotel in the evening.

itinerary.title: TRANSFER TO BELUR, EVENING DEPARTURE TO BANGALORE
brief: Have breakfast, leave the hotel
Drive for Belur
Known for its Hoysala workmanship. Marvel at the architecture
It's time for water sports activities such as Jet Ski, Speed Boat rides, Banana Boat, Bumper rides, Kayaking, and Cruise boats.
Visit Halebid and Chennakesava temple at Belur
Evening departure

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Chopta

Chopta is a small village in Uttarakhand Popularly known as “Mini Switzerland”. The area is surrounded by lofty mountains covered with snow caps most of the month of the year, at an elevation of 8500 feet.

The destination completely lies in the Evergreen forest, famous for trekking to tungnath temple, at an elevation of 12000 feet, trekking to Chandrashila hill which is always covered with snow most of the time. Deoria Tal is a perfect spot for a photoshoot, Kanchula Korak Musk Deer Sanctuary and much other sightseeing which will make your trip unforgettable.

Chandrashila

Chandrashila is a summit at an elevation of 12000 feet from the mean sea level, Chandrashila means Moonrock. It is most popular for its trekking, to its summit. Many Himalayan summits like Nandadevi, Trisul, Kedar Peak, and Bandarpunch are visible from this site. This is the place where Lord Ram meditated after he gained a victory in the battle against Ravana.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO CHOPTA
brief: Our journey will begin At 8 in the evening, from Delhi in an AC Transportation
Halt at Devprayag be a Witness to the beautiful confluence of Bhagirathi & Alaknanda

itinerary.title: ACCLIMATIZATION & EXCURSION
brief: Reach destination (chopta) around noon
Check in to your camps, Get yourself refreshed from the long journey
Afterwards, a delicious lunch will be served
Acclimatize and later in the evening go for the exploration of the local treasury
Have a delightful Dinner and Night's stay at the campsite

itinerary.title: TREK TO TUNGNATH & CHANDRASHILA
brief: Awake up in the picturesque valley, Be prepared for a mouthwatering breakfast
Start your trekking to Tungnath and Chandrashila to get the fascinating view of the sunrise from the mountains
From Tungnath to Chandrashila there is an upright ascent
Finally, You are at Chandrashila mountain peak which is called 'moonrock'
Enjoy your fascinating time at the Chandrashila peak and thereafter trek back to Chopta by evening
Have a tasty Dinner and Nighttime stay

itinerary.title: CHOPTA - DEORIA TAL - DEPARTURE
brief: Wake up, in the lap of the snow-capped mighty mountains, and have a tasty breakfast
Thereafter leave the camp and walk towards Sari village (The entrance point of the Deoria Tal trek)
From Sari, initiate your hike toward Deoria Tal, it will be a 3km trek and will take around 1.5 hrs to reach the point
Later return to the starting point by noon and then depart to Delhi with a lot of unforgettable views and a lot of amazing memories with you

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Kasol

Valley is popularly known for sports, activities, and its handicrafts products including Tibetan handicraft dresses, Prayer wheels, Thangkas, stories and many more things.

Gurudwara Manikaran Sahib, Naina Bhagwati mandir, Manikaran hot water spring, Parvati river and many waterfalls make it a perfect destination.

Tosh

Tosh is a village in Himachal Pradesh, at the height of 7900 feet, situated at the bank of the Parvati river. The village lies in Parvati valley, Hilly terrain and green lush natural greenery will surely make your trip memorable. The village has scattered houses and snow-covered peaks, this destination attracts tourists from all over the globe.

Tosh village, Rudranaag, a snake-shaped waterfall, Hill ice Guesthouse to experience stunning views of the mountain, The green forest, Kheerganga waterfall, incredible location to trek, Parvati valley, Biskeri slide and many more.

You can also enjoy the various adventurous recreations such as walking by the Parvati river, trekking to Malana, trekking to kheerganga, spring water bath, shopping in the local market, enjoying local cuisine and much more.

itinerary.title: Delhi To Kasol
brief: We will depart for our destination at 6 pm from Delhi in an ACTransportion

itinerary.title: Exploring Local sights and Cafe Hopping
brief: Arrive at the destination (Kasol) in the morning, Check-in to the Accommodation, Get yourself refreshed and have a little leisure
Wander around the town, trek to Chalal. Bound into cafes during sundown and market exploration
Feel the calmness of destination seating around Bonfire with chilling Music under the billions of stars

itinerary.title: Tosh Sightseeing & Camping
brief: After having breakfast, let’s head toward Barshaini and afterwards to Tosh
Check in to the campsite. thereafter Outing to local places
Spot the mighty Himalayan ranges in all their renown
Chilling music, Bonfire, Dinner, and Night Stay at the campsite

itinerary.title: Manikaran & Departure
brief: After having a delicious breakfast, stroll back to the Tosh taxi stand and drive to Manikaran to visit Gurudwara Manikaran Sahib
Later on, Pass some time in Kasol before the departure to the Home destination in the evening

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Shimla

Shimla, the capital of Himachal Pradesh, is the most visited hill station in India. The city is loved by people for their honeymoon destinations and family vacations. The city is recognized as a World Heritage site by UNESCO, for its unique cultural and geographical identity in 2008.

The city offers a lot of sightseeing like The Ridge, Mall road famous for its handicraft market, Viceregal lodge and Botanical garden, Jakhu Hill famous temple, Gaiety Theatre, Chadwick falls, Sheeshe wali Kothi known for its architect and history Tibetan Refugee market, and much more.

One can enjoy a lot of adventurous sports activities like Ice Skating, Snow points, Jakhu Ropeway, camping, Trekking, River rafting, Toy train, Paragliding, Pine forest walks, cycling etc. are the activities that one enjoys.

One can also enjoy shopping in the local market for handicraft products, Paintings, terracotta items, Himachal caps and hats, Tibetan Jewellery, wooden and traditional artefacts for your friends and family as a gift and home decoration.

Manali

In a lifetime, we all want to have been a Manali once either with friends or with family. Manali is the most liked honeymoon and holiday destination for couples and solo trips. At the end of Kullu valley, near the Beas river, this beautiful city is located.

Lakes, grassland, a forest of deodar, a waterfall, a garden and other picturesque sites make this destination more attractive to visitors.

Adventure and sports like Paragliding, Rafting, Zorbing, Trekking, and Skiing are the prominent activities of this place.

Kasol

Valley is popularly known for sports, activities, and its handicrafts products including Tibetan handicraft dresses, Prayer wheels, Thangkas, stories and many more things.

Gurudwara Manikaran Sahib, Naina Bhagwati mandir, Manikaran hot water spring, Parvati river and many waterfalls make it a perfect destination.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO MANALI

details.description:
Jaisalmer the "Golden city of India" is known for its royal culture, architecture, forts and embroidery work. The city Jaisalmer means "Hill Fort of Jaisal" established by Rawal Jaisal in 1156 AD. Every year, thousands of people visit this city as their royal holiday destination with friends and family.

A large number of cultural sights and recreational activities will make your trip memorable and Heroic.

Top sightseeing in this destination is Jaisalmer Fort a hill fort in the city, has a Temple, shops, royal style restaurant, Patwon ki haveli group of five Havelis together, a Jain temple, Nathmal ki haveli, Vyas Chhatri a Rajasthani architecture made up of sandstone, Gadisar lake, Desert National park Jaisalmer war museum, Indo Pak Border, Amar Sagar lake, Pokhran, fort and various war sites.

The cultural beauty of this place is on another level, which is reflected in traditional restaurants and the local market attracts a large number of travellers every day. You can also enjoy folk dance, festivals and fairs.

One can enjoy various adventurous and sports activities at this destination Desert Safari, Parasailing, Dune Bashing, Quad Biking, Boating, Camping and much more that will add new adventures to your life.

You can also buy many local traditions, handicraft dresses and Items for decoration and to gift your dear ones, Jewellery, Leather items, Silk scarves, wood artwork and a lot more.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO JAISALMER
brief: The journey begins from Delhi in the evening
The next morning reaches Jaisalmer.

itinerary.title: LOCAL SIGHTSEEING
brief: Halt at Pokharan has Breakfast
Reach the destination by 11 AM,
check in to the Hotel,  and have a little rest
Have lunch, Now it's time For our first visit, to Jaisalmer Fort ( also called Golden Fort) and Gadisar Lake etc.
Dinner and Night stay at the hotel

itinerary.title: SAM SAND DUNES FOR CAMPING
brief: Have breakfast, Time to visit Royal Heritage Havelis like the city Patwon Ki Haveli and Moti Mahal etc
Having lunch, We will move for a desert camping one night in the dunes
Enjoy Desert safari on a camel, At Evening experience Rajasthani folk dance and Rajasthani local cuisine in open
Night stay and dinner in Camp

itinerary.title: TIME TO RETREAT
brief: Have breakfast, and leave your camps to visit historical war fields such as Longewala-Battlefield, War memorial walk, war bunkers, and trenches
After lunch,  depart for a journey to Delhi with extraordinary trip remembrances

itinerary.title: BACK TO HOMETOWN BY MORNING
brief: Depart for Home town by morning

inclusion: There were five meals in all: two meals on Day 1, two meals on Day 2, and one on Day 3.
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
Dubai, A city in the country of the middle east the United Arab Emirates. The city is famously known for its architecture and skyscraper buildings, the city is popularly known for its luxury lifestyle and luxury shopping.

This city is the most liked foreign destination by the Indians due to its fascinating beaches and sports activities. This destination is surrounded by the the Persian Gulf and Arabian desert.

Burj Khalifa, Burj Al Arab, The Dubai Mall, Ski Dubai, The Dubai Fountain, and Dubai Aquarium underwater zoo are the top sights to visit. You can enjoy various sports activities such as Desert Safari, Skydiving at Palm Jumeirah, adventure water park, Enjoy skiing at ski Dubai, Dolphin show, Hot air Balloon flight, Enjoy Lake Ride and can also enjoy shopping here.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO DUBAI
brief: We will benign our journey

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL AT DUBAI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT
brief: Clearing all the legal formalities at the airport, you will be sent to the hotel
Check in to the hotel at 2 pm
Now our representative will bring you from the hotel, for our journey to Marina Cruise at 7 pm
Enjoy the Cruising at Marina in Dubai, Enjoy Full air-conditioning and an open-air deck on the cruise. Have some Beverages and Dinner
Enjoy the Tanura Dance Show and Belly dance by Professional artist
Enjoy the popular Tanura and Belly dance of Dubai
You will be dropped off at the hotel back

itinerary.title: DUBAI CITY TOUR
brief: Pick up from your Hotel
Wake up in the morning with a stunning view of Dubai, our representative will pick you up from the Hotel
Now it’s time to enjoy Dune Bashing, Dubai Creek, Jumeirah Mosque, Jumeirah Beach, Dubai Museum (Ticket Included ), Saga world ( An Abode of luxury Art ), Mall of the Emirates
After exploring such wonderful places we will move for the further expedition at Madinat Jumeirah, Passing New Dubai, Palm Jumeirah island
Thereafter, Now it’s time to see man-made miracles at the Atlantis Hotel, Dubai Marina, Burj Al Arab
Visit the BurjKhalifa, another Human-made miracle (the Tallest Building on the earth), Dubai Mall (Expanded in area of 5,400,000 sq feet.)
Kings Palace ( Home Palace of His Highness Sheikh "MOHAMMAD")
By the Evening get back to your hotel and have a flavourful dinner in the desert land of the Middle East)

itinerary.title: DESERT SAFARI WITH DINE & LIVE SHOWS
brief: In the morning, wake up with joy and happiness, because you are in Dubai. Next morning we will pick you up from the hotel
Be ready to experience the Adventure Safari, Sand Boarding, Tanoura dance show and wonderful Sunset view in Dubai
We can also go for some more recreational activities like Dune Bashing, Camel Ride photoshoot, Belly Dance Performances
Visit the campsite, You will be welcomed with unique Arabic Tea, Coffee, wonderful Arabic Sweets, Soft Drinks, Fresh Fruits and Mineral Water
If you are a photoshoot lover, then this is the right place for you. Here you will get FREE Henna Painting and Arabic Costumes for Photography
Bar-B-Que (BBQ), Dinner (Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian)
Enjoy belly dancing and Tanoura dance at the campsite
By the end of the day, you will be sent back to your accommodation

itinerary.title: BURJ KHALIFA THE SKYSCRAPER WITH 124 FLOORS HAVING MIRACLE GARDEN AND A GLOBAL TOWNLET
brief: Enjoy the high-speed elevator in Burj Khalifa Up to the 124th Floor
Watch the stunning view of the city from the top of the world’s tallest building, talk to the ocean, Desert which makes this city a magical city
Enjoy the marvellous world's largest Flower garden
Enjoy the gorgeous Dubai Garden expanded into the 75000-meter square area, here you will see the different designs and shapes created using flower bushes
Open-air entertainment Park-The Global Village, will give you a lot of chances for recreational activities and download memories into your life with your loved one

itinerary.title: DEPARTURE TO HOME TOWN
brief: Have a Mouth-watering breakfast and leave the hotel for departure to your hometown
Then return flight to your home destinations with fascinating views and recollections and treasure of love forever

inclusion: Meals will be provided throughout the trip every day (1 breakfast and 1 dinner)
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
Any Snacks/ Drinks other than those provided

details.description:
The Maldives is the pride holiday destination of the Indian Ocean . The people in the city have a never-ending blissful life . This country is a group of more than 11 hundred islands. Many of the Indian youths and couples are fascinated toward these destinations for their honeymoon and holiday..

In the Maldives, there are many islands and each Island has its significance and uniqe features. You can relish the beachside in Meeru Islands, resorts in Kanifushi Island, Maafushi, Hulhumale the man made island, Biosphere reserves in Milaidhoo , Slender islands with whales and sharks and many more things to make your holiday awesome..

Diving, Island Hopping, Romantic massage, Underwater snooze, Submarine Ride, Boat Ride, Photoshoot, Fishing, Seaside Dining, Windsurfing, visit to national museum Scuba diving are the sports and recreational activities that one can enjoy during their days in Maldives.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO MALDIVES
brief: Our journey will begin at (MYTP)

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL AT MALDIVES A WONDERFUL DESTINATION
brief: When you arrive at the Maldives airport, our officials will escort you, and will help you to check into the hotel / resort. Afterwards, take some rest and have some recreational activities
In the night have a delightful tasty dinner at a resort
Night stays at a beautiful island holiday destination

itinerary.title: FUN DAY AT BEACH BUNGALOW
brief: In the morning, wake with joy and happiness, Have delicious food for breakfast. Now we will proceed with some water recreational activities
After enjoying the first day now it’s time to utilize your energy to enjoy snorkelling, Catamaran, Sailing, Surfing, Jet skiing, parasailing and many more things
In the night enjoy mouthwatering dinner, and night halt at a beach bungalow, it will be the best of your time

itinerary.title: ENJOYMENT AT WATER VILLA
brief: You will be served delicious food as you will come for Breakfast, afterwards we will move to get some new experience
Let's go out, To enjoy the day with a lot of fun and relaxing natural spa, massage, and natural therapy
At night, go for a lovey-dovey walk with your partner and soak in the ocean’s beauty
In the evening enjoy beachside walking with your loved one, and get yourself Loslen in this wonderful evening
After having a delicious dinner, Night stay in a villa

itinerary.title: GET BACK TO HOME DESTINATION BY MORNING
brief: Today’s breakfast will be our last breakfast at this place. After that, we will leave our hotels to fly back to our home destination
Say goodbye to this place with a smiling face, with lots of memories and recollections of this wonderful place

itinerary.title: DEPARTURE TO HOME TOWN
brief: Have a Mouth-watering breakfast and leave the hotel for departure to your hometown
Then return flight to your home destinations with fascinating views and recollections and treasure of love forever

details.description:
Bali is a city in Indonesia having a group of islands. Many Indian tourists are fascinated by this destination due to its local culture, traditions, lovely beaches, and temples. The past of this city is too old, having the caves of early human settlement time..

One can enjoy many things in this single city, Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, Uluwatu temple, Tegalalang Rice Terrace, Ulun Danu Beratan Temple, Kuta Beach, Goa Gajah, Tegenungan Waterfalls and many more things..

One can also enjoy many recreational activities here like surfing in Kuta Beach, Fun At treetop adventure park, Muck diving in Padang Bai, Jetpack in Tanjung benoa, Watching Kecak dance, visiting Monkey forest etc.

itinerary.title: DELHI TO BALI
brief: Our journey will begin at (MYTP)

itinerary.title: ARRIVAL AT DESTINATION BALI
brief: After a long travel, You are welcome to Bali airport, Bali is the most attractive island holiday destination on the earth. Now our representative will let you to the hotel, Check in to the hotel
Get yourself refreshed, and take a little rest. Thereupon you can walk out for the city exploration on your own
In the evening, get back to the hotel, experience the delicious cuisine of Bali, and have a night's halt hotel in Bali

itinerary.title: COMPLETE DAY KINTAMANI OUTING WITH UBUD VILLAGE
brief: Have a delicious breakfast
Wake up in the morning, on a beautiful island, Have a tasty breakfast and be ready to go on an expedition
Get ready to walk for an extraordinary outing to Kintamani, the place in the  Western Part of Bali
Now, we will visit Ubud village, Tirta Empul and the elephant Temple to experience the pools engraved in Stones
Here we will also see the traditions and culture of this place, and also enjoy Barong and Kris dances
We will also visit to see some volcanoes and Lakes in Batur
Feast on a traditional Balinese lunch included in the package with your companions
Have traditional lunch and dinner

itinerary.title: TANAH LOT TEMPLE TOUR + WATER SPORTS
brief: Wake up in Bali, in the morning have a mouthwatering breakfast, then we will walk out to visit the popular Tanah Temple, a prominent tourist attraction of Bali, Experience the ocean meeting the land
Enjoy adventurous Sports activities Like boating, jet skiing
Afterwards, we will move to visit some more regional sights

itinerary.title: THE ULUWATU TEMPLE TOUR WITH KECAK DANCE
brief: On another beautiful morning, have a mouthwatering feast in the morning and head to visit Garuda Visnu Kencana, Padang Beach and Uluwatu Temple
Enjoy Kecak and Fire Dance
Now after a hectic day, it’s time to have some Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach
After dinner, have a night's halt at the hotel

itinerary.title: DAY AT LEISURE
brief: Holidays are the best way to take a break from your busy daily schedule, manage your time according to your needs
Now it’s time to relish the beautiful beaches of this island city, thereafter we will explore the dense green evergreen woods, hills, volcanoes and so many fantastic things
Feel the natural loveliness of this place
You can drive for outings and clubbing in clubs of Beautiful Bali
After having dinner, go to bed

itinerary.title: RETURN HOME WITH LIFETIME MEMORIES
brief: Now it's time to pack your Bag, Now we will leave this wonderful city with lots of memories
Catch your transfer to Denpasar Airport for your flight to Kuala Lumpur where you’ll board your onward flight to Delhi. (Mytp)

inclusion: Meals will be provided throughout the trip every day (1 breakfast and 1 dinner)
exclusion: Sports and Adventure Activities not included in the itinerary
